api_list.name: Get matching transcript info
api_list.description: Gets matching transcript information by search word/phrase
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-transcript-info.p.rapidapi.com/caption/8KkKuTCFvzI/going to"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-transcript-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-transcript-info.p.rapidapi.com/caption/{videoid}/{search}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-transcript-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get transcript
api_list.description: Gets a transcript of a specific youtube video
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-transcript-info.p.rapidapi.com/caption/8KkKuTCFvzI"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-transcript-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-transcript-info.p.rapidapi.com/caption/{videoid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-transcript-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
